## Basic Info

---

## Current Role

- **Position**: Associate AI/ML Engineer
- **Company**: Motadata (MindArray Systems Pvt. Ltd.)
- **Duration**: Jun 2025 - Present
- **Location**: Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India

---

## Experience Summary

Ahmed has 1.5+ years of experience building LLM-powered systems, automation platforms, and internal AI tools in production environments. He specializes in:

- Large Language Models (LLMs)
- Generative AI
- Agentic Systems
- RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)
- Multi-Agent Architectures
- Enterprise Automation

---

## Key Work at Motadata

### 1. Internal MCP/Agno Platform (OneLayer)
- Multi-agent chat + solution implementation dashboard
- Enables querying across Motadata documentation and tickets
- Used internally by Sales, Ops, and QA teams
- **Tech**: RAG-based embeddings (Weaviate, PGVector), automated test case generation, ticket resolution assistance

### 2. Hardware & BOQ Calculator
- End-to-end system for Sales and Presales teams
- Replaced 2 days of manual work with 2 hours automated workflow
- Daily users: 5-10 people
- **Features**: Auth, logs, documentation, data retention, access controls, backup

### 3. WhatsApp Ticket Automation
- Integrated with Motadata ServiceOps
- Live for 6+ months serving ~200 customers
- ~10-20 tickets/day processed
- **Tech**: Meta APIs, n8n workflows, CRON triggers, conditional routing

### 4. Multi-Agent Blog Generation Pipeline
- Used by Marketing and Sales teams
- Publishes 2-3 external blogs weekly
- Content types: Technical blogs, competitor analysis, feature articles

### 5. ServiceOps AI Copilot
- NL2SQL and RAG-based chatbot for ITSM portals
- **Tech**: LLMs, Python, RAG, Text2SQL

### 6. Research & Analysis
- Deep research on Text2SQL systems (schema grounding, query planning, execution strategies)
- Evaluated automation frameworks (n8n, Dify, Zapier-class systems)
- Led architectural analysis of MoveWorks (closed-source enterprise AI assistant)

---

## AI Transformation & Enablement

- Worked directly under CEO, COO, AIOps Manager, and ServiceOps Manager
- Conducted 1:1 discovery sessions with 9 departments
- Designed and delivered cross-department AI enablement sessions
- Created AI enablement packages (guides, tools, workflows)
- Established monthly internal AI newsletters
- Drove organization-wide AI adoption beyond ad-hoc ChatGPT usage

---

## Previous Experience

### R&D AI Engineer Intern → Full-Time (Aug 2024 - May 2025)
- Company: Motadata, Ahmedabad
- Text2SQL research, automation framework evaluation
- Multi-agent blog generation workflows

### Data Science Intern (May 2024 - Jun 2024)
- Company: Trionic Technologies LLP (Remote)
- LLM localization using Mistral 7b v0.3 Instruct
- Hosted via Ollama/LMStudio with Docker containerization

### Forage Virtual Intern (May 2023 - Jun 2023)
- 7 micro-internships: VISA, AWS, Goldman Sachs, Quantium, Deloitte, British Airways, Accenture
- Domains: API Development, Solutions Architecture, Cyber Security, Data Analysis

## Technical Skills

### GenAI / LLMs
- RAG Systems & Text2SQL
- Multi-Agent Architectures (Single, Multi, Hierarchical)

- Fine-tuning, Quantization (GGUF)
- A2A Protocol

### ML & Data Science
- TensorFlow, PyTorch
- Vector Databases (Weaviate, PGVector)
